---
title: "Big O"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
x <- c(1:10)

n <- x
n2 <- c(x^2)

big_o <- data.frame(x, n, n2) 


ggplot(big_o, aes(x, n2)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_abline(slope = 1, intercept = 0) +
  ggtitle("Memory Complexity") +
  xlab("Amount of Input Data") +
  ylab("Time to Run") +
  theme(axis.text=element_blank(),
        axis.ticks=element_blank())
```
